thread.title: Emails on private devices, FOIA issue goes back to court
thread.title_full: Emails on private devices, FOIA issue goes back to court - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Emails on private devices, FOIA issue goes back to court
text: SPRINGFIELD, Ill. (AP) - The Illinois Freedom of Information Act is clear that government officials' emails about work are public records. Public information advocates argue that emails sent from personal accounts or cellphones should be treated the same way. Chicago Mayor Rahm Emanuel says no, but the Chicago Tribune claims ... ...
